medcap.title: MedCap
medcap.description: Medical analysis platform developed with Streamlit, facilitating medical data interpretation for healthcare professionals.
medcap.longDescription: A comprehensive platform enabling healthcare professionals to efficiently analyze and interpret medical data. Integration of AI models for decision support and early pathology detection.

detection.caption: Interactive map for hospital data by region

evolution.caption: Graph showing pathology evolution over time

video.caption: Demonstration of LangChain and AI workflow

features: Download generated detailed reports and graph

photomad.title: Photomad
photomad.description: Webapp enabling users to share and discover historical photographs, highlighting a community of enthusiasts.
photomad.longDescription: A social platform dedicated to historicaal photography enthusiasts, offering advanced features for sharing, discovery, and interaction. IA for image description generation.

upload.caption: Photo upload interface with AI-generated description

metrics: AI analysis of photos for intelligent description generation
Fluid and intuitive interface for optimal user experience
Person and location identification in photos

ai_call_bot.title: AI Call Bot
ai_call_bot.description: Innovative automated prospecting solution using conversational AI and voice synthesis for natural and efficient calls.
ai_call_bot.longDescription: Automated telephone prospecting platform combining cutting-edge technologies in conversational AI, voice synthesis, and voice recognition. The system enables natural and personalized interactions with prospects, optimizing the prospecting process while maintaining a human approach.
features: Natural and fluid conversations in French

spendwise.title: SpendWise
spendwise.description: Personal budget management tool with Azure Document integration for analyzing bank statements and receipts.
spendwise.longDescription: Innovative personal financial management solution using AI to automate expense categorization and generate relevant insights on consumption habits.
metrics: Intelligent categorization for better budget control
Trend analysis for optimizing personal finances
OCR reading of receipts and bank statements
features: Automatic scanning of receipts and statements

mac_pai.title: Mac-P'AI
mac_pai.description: Platform offering autonomous agents to automate tasks and optimize real-time decision-making processes.
mac_pai.longDescription: Advanced AI-based autonomous agent system capable of automating complex tasks and optimizing real-time decision-making processes. Integration of cutting-edge AI technologies.
metrics: Advanced workflow management with intuitive interface
